product_name: Canari Velocity II Bike Jersey - Women's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: With a not-too-tight, semifitted cut, the Canari Velocity II bike jersey keeps you comfortable from the first mile until you reach your destination, whether it's the finish line or your favorite cafe. Soft, lighweight polyester fabric dries quickly, wicks away moisture and feels soft against skin. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Partial zip allows easy ventilation control; three elastic rear pockets hold essentials such as energy gel, spare tube and a credit card. Droptail hemline on the Canari Velocity II bike jersey ensures full coverage while in the riding position. Closeout.
short_description: With a not-too-tight, semifitted cut, the Canari Velocity II bike jersey keeps you comfortable from the first mile until you reach your destination, whether it's the finish line or your favorite cafe.
